jobs.title: Business Development / Fundraising
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Business Development / Fundraising Executive to support our growth ambitions at Fuel Ventures our early and growth-stage tech venture capital fund as well as direct funding opportunities into our growing portfolio companies. We have a fantastic track record of growth, exits and an exciting portfolio of 34 fast-growth companies.

The role involves a primary focus of finding and converting investors of all types, (relationships, networking, attending events, LinkedIn etc) high net worths investors, ultra-high net worth investors, family offices investors ranging from anyone with £50k-£1m to invest via EIS and up to £10m+ investments from UK or international family offices, venture capital firms, innovative corporates and private equity investors. We already do this successfully and are looking to grow our team with ambitious, hardworking, self-starting individuals.

The commission is uncapped for the right and successful candidates.

It is important that you have the experience with previous fundraising a good investor network and the ability to deliver for this role.

Please describe in your application any relevant fundraising experience you have, investor network, access etc
